title: **A list of commands and their use (1/5)**
description: **The current prefix of this server is `-`. In order to execute a command, use the prefix before writing it. The command will not work if there's a space between the prefix and the command (i.e: - play, - help, etc.) nor is it capital-friendly. React to the emoji to move to the next page.**

fields.name: **Command Categories**
fields.value: Categorized commands for easier classification.

fields.name: **Basic Commands (Page 1)**
fields.value: Shows a variety of commands that are simple and act as a catalyst for future work.

fields.name: **Music Commands (Page 2)**
fields.value: Essential commands to start playing music.

fields.name: **Game Commands (Page 4)**
fields.value: Displays various games aswell as their commands.

fields.name: **Fodder Commands (Page 5)**
fields.value: Shows fodder commands/trash commands that serve as a placeholder.

title: Basic Commands (2/5)
description: **Shows a variety of commands that are simple and act as a catalyst for future work.**

fields.name: hello
fields.value: Says hello back to the user and return their ID.

fields.name: ping
fields.value: Checks the bot's latency/ping (ms)

fields.name: play [link or keywords to song]
fields.value: Play the song; add more keywords if you didn't get the song you want.

fields.name: play_next
fields.value: Plays the next song in queue.

fields.name: stop
fields.value: Stops the song.

fields.name: resume
fields.value: Resumes the currently stopped song in queue.

fields.name: skip
fields.value: Skips the current song playing in queue.

fields.name: del_song [song's position]
fields.value: Removes the designated song in queue.

fields.name: queue
fields.value: Shows the current songs in queue.

fields.name: queue_list
fields.value: Displays a list of songs currently in queue.

fields.name: clear_queue
fields.value: Clears the queue.

title: Game Comands (4/5)
description: **Displays various games aswell as their commands. (Nim-Game Commands)**

fields.name: nim [@user]
fields.value: Create a lobby with the initiator as the host; You can join someone's lobby by mentioning them.

fields.name: nim_cancel
fields.value: Cancels/Delete the current lobby (You must be the lobby's host).

fields.name: nim_lobbies
fields.value: Displays all active nim lobbies.

fields.name: nim_leave
fields.value: Leaves your current lobby.

title: Game Commands (5/5)
description: **Displays various games aswell as their commands. (Generic Game Commands)**

fields.name: daily
fields.value: Claims your daily reward.

fields.name: bal
fields.value: Displays your balance.

fields.name: rob [user's ID]
fields.value: Rob them, shank them, like the Bri'ish.

fields.name: beg
fields.value: Begs for money, begs for mercy, begs for your life.

fields.name: pray [god/demon]
fields.value: HAVE YOU PRAYED TODAY???

fields.name: status_check
fields.value: Displays your status effects.
